Page contentsPage contents Overview Data protection is a fundamental right in the EU. This right is enshrined in Article 8 of the EU Charter of Fundamental Rights.EU data protection legislation is comprised of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the Law Enforcement Directive (LED), and the Data Protection Regulation for EU institutions, bodies, offices and agencies (EUDPR). To ensure that this legislation is applied...
